organizations: Daisuke Matsuzaka of the Red Sox
lead_paragraph: Daisuke Matsuzaka of the Red Sox parked himself by a television in the visiting clubhouse at Baltimore’s Camden Yards and studied the players. He was riveted, speaking or gesturing after almost every pitch.
